title: CSK Jersey

description: Complete set of IPL trading cards featuring all the players from the 2024 season. Limited edition.

description: Comfortable and stylish Delhi Capitals official t-shirt with team logo and IPL 2024 branding.

title: MI Backpack

description: Small, durable keychain with Kolkata Knight Riders logo. Carry your team spirit wherever you go.

title: Party Pack
description: Celebrate your team’s victory with this IPL party pack, including cups, plates, napkins, and party decorations.
